name: Traveler
description: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.

charged.1: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

plunging.1: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

description.0: Grasping the wind's might, you form a vortex of vacuum in your palm, causing continuous <anemo>Anemo DMG</anemo> to opponents in front of you.
description.1: The vacuum vortex explodes when the skill duration ends, causing a greater amount of Anemo DMG over a larger area.
description.4: DMG and AoE will gradually increase.
description.7: If the vortex comes into contact with <hydro>Hydro</hydro>/<pyro>Pyro</pyro>/<cryo>Cryo</cryo>/<electro>Electro</electro>, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type.
description.8: Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.
description.10: You discussed the way to grasp the formless wind with Paimon.

description.0: Guiding the path of the wind currents, you summon a forward-moving tornado that pulls objects and opponents towards itself, dealing continuous <anemo>Anemo DMG</anemo>.
description.3: If the tornado comes into contact with <hydro>Hydro</hydro>/<pyro>Pyro</pyro>/<cryo>Cryo</cryo>/<electro>Electro</electro>, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type.
description.4: Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.
description.6: You and Paimon studied the flapping of a butterfly's wings.

description.0: The last hit of a Normal Attack combo unleashes a wind blade, dealing 60% of ATK as <anemo>Anemo DMG</anemo> to all opponents in its path.
Palm Vortex kills regenerate 2% HP for 5s. This effect can only occur once every 5s.
Palm Vortex pulls in opponents and objects within a 5m radius.
Increases the Level of Gust Surge by 3.
Reduces DMG taken while casting Palm Vortex by 10%.
Increases the Level of Palm Vortex by 3.
Targets who take DMG from Gust Surge have their Anemo RES decreased by 20%.
description.1: If an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.
